interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint scent - 2oz
Review Date: 2022/03/24
Store: Silver Miracles
Product Description: ['Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint is a luxurious and moisturizing cream designed to hydrate and soothe the feet. Infused with colloidal silver and the refreshing scent of peppermint oil, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving feet feeling soft and refreshed. The nourishing ingredients help to moisturize and protect the skin, while the peppermint aroma invigorates and soothes the senses. This foot cream is suitable for daily use and free of harsh chemicals or additives, making it a gentle and effective way to pamper your feet.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Silver Miracles', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Argentum Metallicum', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 2.2 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725022933210', 'Manufacturer': 'L&N Enterprises, LLC'}
Review Text: This is great on the winter heels, I apply it at night and use my moisturizing sock and over the course of a week have found my feet become softer with less flaky dead skin, it's very moisturizing and hydrating applying after a foot bath or a shower.
Review Title: Colloidal silver foot cream
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Kit with Gel Base and Top Coat, 12 Pcs All Seasons Skin Tones Pink Neutral Brown Gel Polish Kit, Soak Off LED Gel Nail Kit Manicure DIY Nail Art Home Salon
BEUXITUN
{'Brand': 'BEUXITUN', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '4.32 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '15', 'Liquid Volume': '0.33 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 4 x 3 inches; 1.35 Pounds'}
This is an ok gel polish. I got the gold and the silver and by themselves they don’t pop but I made a design with other colors and it looked good. It takes a few more dries under the light to cure. One bottle did come with the label upside down. It’s inexpensive and kinda feels it.
Ok
Lenaqueen Wig Caps for Making Wigs Open Wig Caps with PVC Paper for DIY Wigs Swiss Lace Wig Cap with Adjustable Strap for Weave Wig (Medium, Black)
Lenaqueen
{'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.18 x 0.39 inches; 0.42 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LNWIGCAP'}
This is a good quality wig cap that comes with 3 combs. It’s easy to fit on to the head and it feels comfortable. I plan to use this to make a weave and think it’s good quality for that.
Good quality
Lenaqueen Velvet Wig Grip Band Adjustable No Slip Wig Grip Headbands for Women Keep Wigs in Place Grip Wig Bands (Black)
Lenaqueen
{'Material': 'Velvet', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'Lenaqueen', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.18 x 0.39 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
I’m new to wig grips but I really like them. I use this one on my headband wig in order to keep it from shifting on my head. It’s easy to put on and does not add a bulge to the wig.
Wig grip
O.M.CHIC Mannequin Head with shoulders for wig, Display wigs Eyeglasses Necklaces and Earrings
O.M.CHIC
{'Package Dimensions': '18.3 x 15.7 x 9 inches; 5.1 Pounds', 'UPC': '714676502699 714676502675'}
I really like this mannequin. It’s different to others that I’ve had. It is able to stand alone without the use of a tripod thanks to its base. Her make up is great for accentuating wigs or jewelry I want to display for sale. Her lips give a bit of attitude which I like. It’s good quality and I think well price.
Excellent quality
8 Color Colored Liquid Eyeliner Colorful Pen Set,Neon Green Purple White Blue Black Rainbow Colorful Matte Liquid Eyeliner Set Eye Liners for Women Waterproof Pencil delineadores de colores para ojos
evpct
{'Product Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.28 x 0.63 inches; 4.66 Ounces'}
8 different colors and they are all amazing. My first time with different color eyeliners and I really like them. It’s waterproof and lasts a hood few hours. I unintentionally fell i asleep in the blue and it was a mess the day after but that’s to be expected. I wore to work (in a kitchen/chef duties) and it lasted, so it pretty good in my books.
Great combination and a fantastic price

I found this very good for wearing around the house during the day but not so good for sleeping, this is because it did not stay on. It kept sliding off. It is good for hair because of the satin insert and I quite like it for this. Stitching was good, no issues there.
Sleep Bonnet
Unaone Scalp Massager Shampoo Brush, Care Hair Brush with Soft Silicone Scalp Massager Wet and Dry Hair Scalp Brushes for Long Thick Curly Hair

Good pair of silicone shampoo brushes. They have an included handle for hanging in the shower and ents to drain the excess water. Using it is more effective than fingertips especially in my daughter's hair as she finds the use of my fingers rough. Easy to wash and keep clean.
shampoo brush

profile:
**User Summary**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to demonstrate a strong passion for DIY beauty projects, particularly in gel nail care, wig-making, colorful eyeliners, and hair care tools, now adding foot care to their routine with a focus on moisturizing products. Their holistic approach emphasizes the importance of nourishing the skin, particularly in seasonal care.

- **Quality Expectations:** They consistently prioritize non-toxic and cruelty-free products that enhance skin health, as evidenced by their commitment to effective foot care solutions. This reflects a broader dedication to quality across all facets of their beauty regimen.

- **Aesthetics:** The user appreciates high-quality and visually appealing accessories that blend functionality with design, maintaining a vibrant and stylish aesthetic in their selections.

- **Performance Concerns:** They value effectiveness and ease of use in their beauty tools and products, striving for enjoyable and practical experiences. Their positive feedback on skin-hydrating applications underscores this focus.

- **Pricing Sensitivity:** Budget-conscious, the user seeks reasonable-priced items that still deliver quality and performance, highlighting satisfaction with value in their evaluations.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user provides detailed reviews that emphasize both strengths and weaknesses, reflecting their experienced perspective and desire for reliable beauty solutions.

Overall, the user seeks versatile, ethical, and aesthetically pleasing beauty tools while maintaining high standards for performance and value in their beauty journey, now expanding their interest to include attentive foot care as well.
